a.span: TMSA Public Charter Schools Go Digital starting on Monday, 03/16/2020

div.h2: Welcome to Triangle Math and Science Academy

div.p:
Triangle Math and Science Academy is a STEM-focused, tuition-free public charter school in Cary, NC, committed to providing exceptional educational experiences for K-12 students. To fulfill our mission, TMSA implements a rigorous curriculum supported by research and with a strong emphasis on science, technology, engineering, and mathematics. Merged into all classes are higher-order thinking skills and 21st Century skills, including problem-solving, critical thinking, creativity, and effective communication and collaboration skills. TMSA believes in building strong school-family-community partnerships and healthy, caring student-teacher relationships. We provide a safe, nurturing, and culturally-responsive learning environment.
Core values of TMSA include responsibility, respect, resilience, diversity, courage, and industriousness.
Fundamental to our mission:

ul.li: A commitment to active involvement of students and parents
A competent and caring staff and leadership
Academic growth and excellence for all students
